data.name: AlgoPainter
data.description:
## What Is AlgoPainter?

AlgoPainter is a decentralized application platform designed to make programmable art in form of NFTs on the blockchain.

Using the platform, you can choose an artist and have your unique and exclusive artworks! Each composition is minted as a non-fungible token (NFT) on the blockchain.
An AlgoPainter can be software or a known artist. If it is software, the developer can integrate it into the platform. If it is a known artist, he/she can send the work for auction or receive orders from collectors. Users can create, sell and collect unique artworks and receive commissions for participating in auctions due to the BidBack System.

ALGOP is the native utility token that is used for, but not limited to:

* Participating on the PIRs system;
* Participating on the BidBack System;
* Buy digital pieces;


## How Many ALGOP Coins Are There in Circulation?

AlgoPainter launched its token on the 29th of April 2021, and there is 10% of the total supply in circulation, from a total of 100 million tokens.


### Who Are the Founders of AlgoPainter?

AlgoPainter is the brainchild of developers Gleisson Assis and Antonio Hoffert, both of whom have extensive experience in programming and business.

The two have a Software House in Brazil, specialized in Blockchain that attends clients all over the world.

This project was born on the NFT Hack, promoted by Eth Global in March 2021.

### Where Can I Buy AlgoPainter (ALGOP)?

ALGOP is available for trading on PancakeSwap, with BNB and BUSD (https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/article/what-is-a-stablecoin) pairs currently available.

[PancakeSwap](https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/pancakeswap/) offers the largest number of pairs as of April 2021

New to cryptocurrency? Read CoinMarketCap’s [easy guide](https://coinmarketcap.com/how-to-buy-bitcoin/) to buying Bitcoin or any other token.
